com.tinfoil.sms.sms

Class MessageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.tinfoil.sms.sms.MessageView

  • public class MessageView
extends Activity
    MessageView activity allows the user to view through all the messages from or to the defined contact. selectedNumber will equal the contact that the messages belong to. If a message is sent or received the list of messages will be updated and Prephase3Activity's messages will be updated as well.
